entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle or showers this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
